html:
2.1.21  10:39 am   Can you tell me how you got this much wisdom?

      i'm in a box

2.1.21  9:58 am   if you know little about music how do you write a song

      you'll have to try it and see

2.1.21  9:30 am   What is your opinion on potatoes?

      i often wonder if they could all be combined into one huge potato

2.1.21  9:05 am   Why is the world boring?

      so you don't get too overwhelmed

2.1.21  8:04 am   why don't you ever make 60fps videos since it's smoother and it's 20211?

      here comes the sun was actually made at 60fps, and near the finishing stages i figured out that switching it to 30fps was the only thing that made me stop hating it

2.1.21  7:32 am   What makes you make songs?

      the possibility that they may be used as a communication vehicle

2.1.21  6:19 am   Why did you change your videos creating to 3D?

      common sense really

2.1.21  5:08 am   Will you run for president in 2024?

      no

2.1.21  4:28 am   When (what years) did you write the song you are currently working on the video for?

      2019

2.1.21  4:02 am   What's the most times you've ever modulated in one song?

      maybe 22 or 23

2.1.21  4:02 am   What's something that's extremely versatile?

      the stick

2.1.21  2:58 am   in 'here comes the sun'  the line, "the buildings wonder if they'll ever be built"  a metaphor for the dreams which are yet to be accomplished ?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

2.1.21  2:49 am   Why do you answer most of our questions with an answer that might help, but doesn't give all of the required information?

      if you give too much information, the person stops reading

2.1.21  1:44 am   what's one of the most awkward interactions you've ever had

      going online

2.1.21  1:32 am   what is might quit about

      it seems to have themes of independence, finding your way in the world, etc

2.1.21  12:52 am   Where or how did you develop your musical and graphical style? 

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

2.1.21  12:17 am   Do you say things just because they sound cool

      that may be 1 of many reasons





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

1.31.21  11:06 pm   Is there a point to life?

      yes

1.31.21  10:54 pm   What's the easiest way to learn scales?

      someone could probably just email you a list of notes

1.31.21  10:47 pm   Is this actually you answering these questions?  

      yes. everyone is themselves

1.31.21  10:45 pm   How do you feel about short films?

      it really depends on the length of each of the other films

1.31.21  10:24 pm   Why is the background colour of the lyrics page Red?

      to make it an uncomfortable visual experience, to discourage you from spending too much time looking at only the lyrics without their music

1.31.21  10:20 pm   what the hell should I write my short story about

      how about something extremely long

1.31.21  9:48 pm   Do you never use capital letters because you're an anti-capitalist?

      somehow you are actually wrong 3 times at once here

1.31.21  8:51 pm   When the sun becomes a giant red thing and ends all life on Earth and possibly humanity, what will happen to everything we've accomplished? Will it all just... go?

     by then, i'm sure it will have already gone many different places

      If so, what is the point of basically doing anything when it does not matter at the end?

     IN WHAT WORLD DOES GOING NOT MATTER

1.31.21  7:20 pm   What has inspired your design layouts for animations and videos?

      necessity

1.31.21  7:04 pm   will your new song release soon

      yes

1.31.21  6:19 pm   What's your best advise for struggling artists?

      depict the struggle, artistically

1.31.21  4:25 pm   Your opinion on jellyfish:

      unable to smile or frown, they must innovate to show their emotions in different ways

1.31.21  3:43 pm   What are your opinions on sand?

      bland

1.31.21  2:27 pm   i have a question, what was the thought process behind the skitvideo ball and stick, what's the meaning behind it,

     they just look phenomenal in the frame together. any excuse to put those 2 together

     and also was that ball in the castle before the owl sent him that fake jail

      yes

1.31.21  1:04 pm   in here comes the sun why are the buildings wondering if they'll ever be built if they're already built?

      you could have been looking at a speculative/fictionalized rendering

1.31.21  11:42 am   how do you make your music satisfying? 

      i have an electric shock device which shocks me every time the music is not satisfying enough

1.31.21  10:44 am   among those you have created, which is your favorite song?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.31.21  10:35 am   how does one come up with a melody?

      try focusing your attention on something that's not a melody

1.31.21  10:35 am   how long is the word long?

      pretty short

1.31.21  9:57 am   can you give me a sense of what the 5 minute long "here comes the sun" was originally like?

      i don't think it was ever 5 minutes, but the roadmap was pretty much all set through the end of the bridge, except for some line replacements. and after the bridge it made its best earnest attempt to get back to the chorus and end it

1.31.21  9:33 am   is a poem the same thing as a song?

     no

      because in When i get older you say you're gonna write a poem about rain and the water droplets that it creates but there's no text after that..

     could be a metaphor

1.31.21  9:30 am   I am mystified by rabbit snakes, and yet it's one of my favorites of yours. I'd never assume it's an artist's place to explicate their work but do you have anything to share about the motivations or context of writing it? Thanks <3

      yes, basically i was getting more and more frustrated year after year that the songwriting just wasn't happening, despite feeling very terribly overqualified for it. i had already envisioned a strategy of 'making the first part bad', but even that wasn't getting me anywhere. so i updated my strategy to: 'make the first part really insanely bad like you don't understand like please really go ahead and sabatoge the thing'

1.31.21  9:19 am   how to come up with good analogies when trying to explain stuff?

      think of it like a bike. in this case, the bike is the bike. just get on the bike

1.31.21  8:49 am   what is your genre

      medium

1.31.21  6:40 am   what is normal?

      how about traveling to the far reaches of outer space

1.31.21  6:19 am   How are things going? Do you think you're getting closer to your goal of being able to release a new video every week?

      yes

1.31.21  5:23 am   What's a good food?

      the noodle

1.31.21  5:09 am   how do i make a video for a song..(with no lyrics)

      you'll just have to listen even more closely for what the song is saying

1.31.21  4:23 am   I don't really want to ask questions, but you are the one that inspired me to play instruments. How do you achieve your level of jazz?

      could check out some pop

1.31.21  3:30 am   what inspired you to make time mop?

      was running some experiments in sort of trapping myself inside a rectangle. that's the best way i can really explain it

1.31.21  3:15 am   What's your message for the future?

      i will tell you a little later

1.31.21  3:06 am   hey whats ur advice to discard repressing emotions and actually addressing them thanks 

      make up a song about it

1.31.21  2:44 am   how are you so funny? share your secrets

      anyone can be funny. just do stuff that's not funny and wait for people to be mad at you for not being funny. at least that's the way i do it
